TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICustomFactory

Docs.summary: Enables users to write activation code for managed objects that extend .

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can enable custom activation by providing a proxy class that implements `ICustomFactory` and attributing the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class with the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.ProxyAttribute>. When the class is activated, the proxy's <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomFactory.CreateInstance%2A> method is called by the common language runtime to activate the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.MarshalByRefObject CreateInstance(class System.Type serverType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified type.
Docs.returns: A associated with the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CreateInstance` is called by the common language runtime when a new object of the specified type needs to be created. Override this method to provide your own custom class factory.
